I create a concept - well... if i=
t is possible - of entities,
containers and state machines: With "entities"=
 I define a business
logic; the "container" is a collection of "entities", =
it is a "entity"
too; the "state machine" is responsible by create and use =
GUIs,
DataBases, reports, etc...
The "state machine" implement a "factory p=
attern", it receive as
parameter a "entity" or a "container of entities" an=
d than build GUIs,
DataBases, wherever...
The "state machine" have a "index=
ed property", than I need check if
this property is correctly populated. Th=
at is the problem, is really
painfully do this kind of test for all new sta=
te machine. Maybe
generics solve my problem.

If you have some idea I reall=
y like to listen.

Thanks about our time. :)
